text: The 1958 Connecticut gubernatorial election was held on November 4, 1958. Incumbent Democrat Abraham Ribicoff defeated Republican nominee Fred R. Zeller with 62.29% of the vote. ==General election== ===Candidates=== Major party candidates *Abraham Ribicoff, Democratic *Fred R. Zeller, Republican Other candidates *Jasper McLevy, Socialist ===Results=== ==References== 1958 Connecticut Gubernatorial
title: 1958 Connecticut gubernatorial election
